body.name: [Apple MFi Certified] iPhone Fast Car Charger, Rombica 4.8A Dual USB Smart Power Car Rapid Charger with 2 Pack Lightning to USB Quick Car Charging Cord for iPhone 14/13/12/11/XS/XR/SE/X 8/iPad/AirPods
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 54 mins
features: 【Equipped with Dual USB Smart Power】: Using highly efficient components and an advanced chipset, Rombica's High-Tech Chip Technology is perfectly compatible with iPhone. Our intelligent power fast car charger can charging two iPhone devices simultaneously, Provide a maximum of 2.4A/12W if a single port is used and 4.8A/24W when dual ports are used. Our most advanced charging technology ever charges virtually iPhone at its fastest possible, the charging speed is directly increased by 4 times.

【2 Pack MFi Certified Lightning Cable】: Rombica's Lightning to USB cable with latest C89 termina. This MFi-Certified lightning cable is compatible with the following lightning devices: iPhone 14/14 Plus/14 Pro/14 Pro Max/13/13 Mini/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/12/12 Mini/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/SE 2020/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XR/XS/XS Max/X 8 7 6 5, iPad, AirPods. The MFi Certified Cable comes with surge protection and 56KΩ pull-up resistor for preventing excessive current maximize charging efficiency.

【Leading the Way in Smart Chip Tech】: Built-in intelligent power management chip and advanced temperature control system that match the current required by the iPhone device automatically while maximizing charging speed and efficiency. Features a Dynamic Temperature Sensor which actively monitors temperature, and a Power Tuner Chip which adjusts power output to safeguard your connected iPhone/iPad/AirPods device.

【Multiple Security Advanced Protection】: Certified by MFi, UL, ETL, FCC, CE, ROHS approve. Built-in MFi Certified Chipset provide overvoltage protection, battery protector and automatic chip recognition functions preventing your iPhone from over chargerd and overheating. Rombica's exclusive all-new iActivePower safety system with overload protection to enhanced safe charging, Provides continuous temperature monitoring and output control to protect your connected iPhone/iPad.

【Premium Materials and Design】: The housing made of an aluminum alloy + ABS fireproof materials offers better scratch resistance, heat dissipation, attractive design, and long service life, perfect for the most untouched vehicle interiors. Gold-plated tubing reduces heat during charging while maximizing charging speed and efficiency. The ring LED indicator can help you to find the charging ports easily in the dark, Easily fits in a car cigarette Lighter socket with limited space.
body.description: MFi Certified 4.8A Dual USB Smart Power Fast Car Charger for iPhone 14/13/12/11/XS/XR/SE/X 8/iPad/AirPods4X Fast Charging and Dual USB Smart Power:1. Our Dual USB car charger with advanced independent output technologies automatically charging two iPhone simultaneously.2. Rombica's exclusive intelligent power management chip, make a 100% increase in operating frequency, Charge speed increased by more than 4 times.Technical Specifications:2 * MFi Certified Lightning CableInput Voltage: DC12-24VEach USB Output: 5.0V--2.4ATotal Output: 24WLed Indicator: Blue LightCertifications: MFi Certified/UL/ETL/FCC/CE/ROHSApplicable Equipment:iPhone 14, 14 Plus, 14 Pro, 14 Pro MaxiPhone 13, 13 Mini, 13 Pro, 13 Pro MaxiPhone 12, 12 Mini, 12 Pro, 12 Pro MaxAirPods Pro/3/2/1iPhone SE 2020iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro MaxiPhone X, XR, XS, XS MaxiPhone 8, 8 PlusiPhone 7, 7 PlusiPhone 6, 6 Plus, 6S, 6S PlusiPhone 5, 5C, 5S, SEiPad, iPodMFi Certified Lightning to USB Cable:1. Adopt Original C89 Terminal and Smart Chip, builds a double protection for your iPhone or iPad.2. Built-in overvoltage protection, battery protector and automatic chip recognition functions protect your iPhone/iPad/AirPods battery well from damages.Latest iActivePower Technology:1. Built in High-Tech Chipset and Protection Resistor, Protect your iPhone against short circuiting, over-heating, over-currents, and over-charging.2. Features a Dynamic Temperature Sensor which actively monitors temperature, and a Power Tuner Chip which adjusts power output to safeguard your connected iPhone/iPad device.Hassle-Free Warranty:1. We provide 6-Years Warranty for This Car Charger and Lifetime Technical Support.2. What You Get: Rombica's 4.8A/24W Dual USB Smart Power Fast Car Charger + 2 * MFi Certified USB to Lightning Cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The plug lights up so u can find it in the dark. It’s fast and has 2 ports so me and my husband can use it at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have not tried it yet, otherwise I would give it five stars. But it looks like a very well-made item product and I just put it in my car but I have not used it yet. Very sturdy very durable and it’s very good for Apple products. If it doesn’t work, I will update this later, but for the price I feel it is a very good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does what it says it will—charges your phone. Only thing I don’t like is when I’m using it my phone can’t “talk” to my car. The map apps can’t operate through my console. That made it necessary to use this for only equipment—like plugging in a tablet or another phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed new chargers for the car and decided to try these. Very good products and the charger cord is a good length. They do the job and are definitely faster than my older charger.Good purchase and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fast charger
reviews.reviewText: This charger is faster than the one I use at home. Would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewText: Everything fit and arrived in time
